properties.description:
Ejecuta proceso de escalado del DWH
Se debe setear el parametro DWU.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
--Escalar Data Warehouse
ALTER DATABASE dwh
MODIFY (SERVICE_OBJECTIVE = '@{pipeline().parameters.DWU}');

SELECT 'ok' AS Resultado

source.sqlReaderQuery:
--Verificar estatus de escalado cada 5 segudnos
WHILE 
(
    SELECT TOP 1 state_desc
    FROM sys.dm_operation_status
    WHERE 
        1=1
        AND resource_type_desc = 'Database'
        AND major_resource_id = 'dwh'
        AND operation = 'ALTER DATABASE'
    ORDER BY
        start_time DESC
) = 'IN_PROGRESS'
BEGIN
    RAISERROR('El escalado de la base de datos est√° en progreso',0,0) WITH NOWAIT;
    WAITFOR DELAY '00:00:05';
END
WAITFOR DELAY '00:00:30';
Select 'Complete' AS Resultado;
